name: Bali Tour
Description: You will enjoy with us a lot if you choose this package. We have dinner and launch facilities.Moreover, we can provide you with first aid. But other costs is yours. We also accommodate you with luxarius hotels with sea side views.You will have a memorable tour for the lifetime, we guarantee. Make us your reasonable partner in your tour
facilities: AC Bus travels,lunch and dinner,site seeing
